tool_description:
The first reviews engine for products that works directly from grocery stores while you are shopping. 

GoodFoods offers the latest information on healthy eating options and to provide recommendations and reviews that inform your personal choices. As a member of the GoodFoods community, you can browse the site, check out reviews, and leave your own comments on products you’ve tried. The feedback you provide will help inform others, giving everyone the resources they need to make quality choices.
name: Search grocery product reviews by barcode
title: Search grocery product reviews by barcode
tool_name: Search grocery product reviews by barcode
